Title: #17: Microsoft One Note: Useful Tips and Tricks for the Classroom
Description:
Dr. Tom Grissom @tomgrissom shares a useful tool, Microsoft One Note. Today we discuss:

  • A description of Microsoft One Note
  • What Microsoft Classroom does with One Note
  • The collaborative features of One Note
  • The features beyond notetaking including taking notes in multiple notes
  • The cognitive research and how to use One Note for review and retention

A full transcript of this show and the show notes are available at www.coolcatteacher.com/podcast as well as details on entering this month’s giveaway contests.
